method.name: attackIt
method.description: For the crowd agent, to attack this element. Return 'true' upion action completion. The attack action is considered as completed when the target unit is no more operational (major components of the unit are destroyed).

method.name: isReached
method.description:
Returns true if this object has a proximity of 100% and should be considered as being reached by the agent, false otherwise.
This implementation returns 'true' once this element (the unit) is within the crowd agent.
